name: LP calibration parameters
description: The LP_X_CA_1B Product contains the TCF.LP Data Set records containing the LP calibration parameters determined in the Level 1b Processor from the Offset Determination Sweep Mode telemetry including the measurements themselves.
variables_table:
Variable,Units,Description,Dim,Type
Timestamp,-,Time stamp,1,CDF_EPOCH
SyncStatus,-,Synchronization status,1,CDF_UINT2
Probe1_I_Bias_Offset,V,Probe 1 current bias offset,1,CDF_DOUBLE
Probe1_I_Slope_Offset,V,Probe 1 current slope offset,1,CDF_DOUBLE
Probe1_I_Fit_Error,V,Probe 1 current fit error,1,CDF_DOUBLE
Probe1_U_Bias_Offset,V,Probe 1 voltage bias offset,1,CDF_DOUBLE
Probe1_U_Slope_Offset,V,Probe 1 voltage slope offset,1,CDF_DOUBLE
Probe1_U_Fit_Error,V,Probe 1 voltage sweep fit error,1,CDF_DOUBLE
Probe2_I_Bias_Offset,V,Probe 2 current bias offset,1,CDF_DOUBLE
Probe2_I_Slope_Offset,V,Probe 2 current slope offset,1,CDF_DOUBLE
Probe2_I_Fit_Error,V,Probe 2 current fit error,1,CDF_DOUBLE
Probe2_U_Bias_Offset,V,Probe 2 voltage bias offset,1,CDF_DOUBLE
Probe2_U_Slope_Offset,V,Probe 2 voltage slope offset,1,CDF_DOUBLE
Probe2_U_Fit_Error,V,Probe 2 voltage sweep fit error,1,CDF_DOUBLE
FP_I_Bias_Offset,V,Face Plate current bias offset,1,CDF_DOUBLE
FP_I_Slope_Offset,V,Face Plate current slope offset,1,CDF_DOUBLE

FP_U_Slope_Offset,V,Face Plate voltage slope offset,1,CDF_DOUBLE
FP_U_Fit_Error,V,Face Plate voltage sweep fit error,1,CDF_DOUBLE
FP_I_offset,eu,Face Plate current offset measurements,32,CDF_INT2
FP_U_offset,eu,Face Plate bias offset measurements,32,CDF_INT2
P1_I_offset,eu,Probe 1 current offset measurements,32,CDF_INT2
P1_U_offset,eu,Probe 1 bias offset measurements,32,CDF_INT2
P1_ref_ADC2,eu,Probe 1 reference ADC2,32,CDF_INT2
P1_ground,eu,Probe 1 ground,32,CDF_INT2

P1_Slope,V,"robe 1 slope offset, determined on-board",1,CDF_DOUBLE
P1_Bias,V,"Probe 1 bias offset, determined on-board",1,CDF_DOUBLE
P1_Error,V,"Probe 1 sweep fit error, determined on-board",1,CDF_DOUBLE
